description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a React application, defining color variables and styles for various UI components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application that sets overall styling including background color and text color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application that contains layout and styling for the header.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button used to toggle between themes with specific hover and active styles.
